article_title: Healthcare Consolidation Leaves Consumers With Fewer Choices And More Problems

article_metadata.author: Capital Flows

og.description: BY HADLEY HEATH MANNING - We lack efficiency in today’s healthcare system exactly because we lack real competition, not because we have too much of it.
